content: I am in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

the original point was for lean users to find other lean users in their local area. for instance, there's a cambridge user group, but cambridge students that find lean independently might not know that there are people that they can talk to about lean!
To discover/announce that there are other people interested in Lean in a particular geographic area. With COVID19 happening, this isn't that relevant, but hopefully will be again...

Alexandre Rademaker said:

I am in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

You should start a new thread @Alexandre Rademaker !
